DataElement.preferredName: Modified Toxicity Criteria Insomnia Condition Grade
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the modified toxicity criteria for insomnia grade.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: National Marrow Donor Program Modified Toxicity Criteria Insomnia Condition
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Criteria established by the National Marrow Donor Program (NMDP) that assesses potential toxicities following peripheral blood or bone marrow stem cell collection from donors and includes: fever in absence of infections; fatigue; rashes; injection site reaction; nausea; vomiting; loss of appetite; inability to sleep; dizziness, vertigo, or lightheadedness; fainting; and pain.:A sleep disorder characterized by difficulty in falling asleep and/or remaining asleep._A state of being, such as a state of health.

ObjectClass.preferredName: National Marrow Donor Program Modified Toxicity Criteria
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Criteria established by the National Marrow Donor Program (NMDP) that assesses potential toxicities following peripheral blood or bone marrow stem cell collection from donors and includes: fever in absence of infections; fatigue; rashes; injection site reaction; nausea; vomiting; loss of appetite; inability to sleep; dizziness, vertigo, or lightheadedness; fainting; and pain.

Concepts.longName: National Marrow Donor Program Modified Toxicity Criteria
Concepts.definition: Criteria established by the National Marrow Donor Program (NMDP) that assesses potential toxicities following peripheral blood or bone marrow stem cell collection from donors and includes: fever in absence of infections; fatigue; rashes; injection site reaction; nausea; vomiting; loss of appetite; inability to sleep; dizziness, vertigo, or lightheadedness; fainting; and pain.

Property.preferredDefinition: A sleep disorder characterized by difficulty in falling asleep and/or remaining asleep._A state of being, such as a state of health.

Concepts.definition: A sleep disorder characterized by difficulty in falling asleep and/or remaining asleep.
A state of being, such as a state of health.
